entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow at times mixed with freezing rain changing to rain late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 06 March 2023
